On <WG1519> Which <WG3739> Having Looked Intently <WG816> I Considered, <WG2657> And <WG2532> Saw <WG1492> The <WG3588> Quadrupeds <WG5074> Of The <WG3588> Earth <WG1093> And <WG2532> The <WG3588> Wild Beasts <WG2342> And <WG2532> The <WG3588> Creeping Things <WG2062> And <WG2532> The <WG3588> Birds <WG4071> Of The <WG3588> Heaven. <WG3772>

<WG2036> But I Said, <WG1161> In No Wise, <WG3365> Lord, <WG2962> For <WG3754> Anything <WG3956> Common <WG2839> Or <WG2228> Unclean <WG169> Never <WG3763> Entered <WG1525> Into <WG1519> <WG3588> Mouth. <WG4750> My <WG3450>

<WG611> But Answered <WG1161> Me <WG3427> A Voice <WG5456> The <WG1537> Second Time <WG1208> Out Of <WG1537> The <WG3588> Heaven, <WG3772> What <WG3739> <WG3588> God <WG2316> Cleansed, <WG2511> Thou <WG4771> Not <WG3361> Make Common. <WG2840>
<WG5124> And This <WG1161> <WG1096> Took Place <WG1909> Thrice, <WG5151> And <WG2532> Again <WG3825> Was Drawn Up <WG385> All <WG537> Into <WG1519> The <WG3588> Heaven. <WG3772>

And <WG2532> , Lo, <WG2400> At Once <WG1824> Three <WG5140> Men <WG435> Stood <WG2186> At <WG1909> The <WG3588> House <WG3614> In <WG1722> Which <WG3739> <WG1510> Sent <WG649> From <WG575> Caesarea <WG2542> To <WG4314> Me. <WG3165>

<WG3415> And I Remembered <WG1161> The <WG3588> Word <WG4487> Of The Lord, <WG2962> How <WG5613> He Said, <WG3004> John <WG2491> Indeed <WG3303> Baptized <WG907> With Water <WG5204> <WG5210> But Ye <WG1161> Shall Be Baptized <WG907> With The <WG1722> Spirit <WG4151> Holy. <WG40>

<WG450> And Having Risen Up <WG1161> One <WG1520> From Among <WG1537> Them, <WG846> By Name <WG3686> Agabus, <WG13> He Signified <WG4591> By <WG1223> The <WG3588> Spirit, <WG4151> A Famine <WG3042> Great <WG3173> Is About <WG3195> To Be <WG2071> ' Over <WG1909> Whole <WG3650> The <WG3588> Habitable World; <WG3625> Which <WG3748> Also <WG2532> Came To Pass <WG1096> Under <WG1909> Claudius <WG2804> Caesar. <WG2541>
